channel.title: What will make you play a new server?
channel.description:
What will make you play a new RSC server released? Give your ideas and maybe it will happen.
This is ur chance to get your thoughts out, genuine ideas please.
- xp rate? - features? - fully customised or keep it RSC-level with more features?
Anything, express yourself!

item.title: What will make you play a new server?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

low rates,
decent administration
longterm uptime

Read full topic
item.source: What will make you play a new server?

item.title: What will make you play a new server?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

NoLives:

If you have this, why don’t you host it? I’m sure people would like it more than RSCE…

I don’t see why anyone would want a slightly order version of the released source over RSCE’s source which isn’t released and is arguably better (I’m saying arguably because a few idiots who dislike me will disagree but it’s obviously better in pretty much every way).

Read full topic
item.source: What will make you play a new server?

item.title: What will make you play a new server?
item.dc:creator: @iMubbY_App iMubbY App
item.description:
@iMubbY_App wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:20, topic:435663"][quote author=iMubbY App link=topic=538382.msg3941626#msg3941626 date=1331449885]

Last week I send a JDB to Mubby and started looking through his files. He is creating a Nude rsc server lmao. I deleted alot of his code and started scaring him then he just reformated like a pussy.

Deleted alot of his code you sound like a retard lol.
[/quote]
Being infected with a JDB makes you sound like a retard lol.[/quote]
Well, you are what YOU say you are. Shouldn’t take long to figure it out.

ixl p0tz ixl:

Why was he referring to himself in 3rd person… Mubby I told you it was my new server, and like always you wanted to get on to beg for admin and try and ruin it lol… I opened up chat on you and you started begging me to quit. I then redirected you to Www.Besties.org with 10000 redirects. Opened your cd tray, hid all your files, and you shut your computer down and re-installed.But before that I got all your passwords. What were your masswords again? O yea Makaveli420 or something like that.

You didn’t do FUCK ALL. I don’t remember anything happening except for speaking on chat so prove it. Passwords that are 5 years old wow, I haven’t even changed my email passwords so how come you don’t have them?

Read full topic
item.source: What will make you play a new server?

item.title: What will make you play a new server?
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:11, topic:435663”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=538382.msg3939418#msg3939418 date=1331297657]
If you can quarrantee over 50 people on the server, 1-2x rate and default rsca source.
If its under 50 people, custom server with semi to high rate.
[/quote][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=538382.msg3939390#msg3939390 date=1331295546]

[quote author=dexto link=topic=538382.msg3939380#msg3939380 date=1331293861]
x2-x3 xp rate
Latest RSCA source

Keep it default.
[/quote]Latest RSCA source is very buggy, unless you consider the MoparClassic source RSCA, but there have been over 680k lines changed.
[/quote][/quote]I wouldnt have any idea about that, but what I meant was the source that actually worked.

Read full topic
